text: It says coming soon on the website, when will be available?
I bought so much cute stuff for my granddaughter from you. But not now. You could get me back by changing your game. Own your mistakes.

Hello Morgan - Thank you for reaching out about the Disney and Marvel Collection by Pillowfort! They are just adorable. If the item you are waiting for is not available yet, please keep an eye on our website for updates. Super cute items to pick from, we hope you get all the things! - Sheng
My daughter and I used to love going to Target together, but now I'm afraid of what the future holds for her in a world where she has fewer rights than I did. No DEI, no Target.

It’s such a shame that you’ve turned your back on the community the way you have, and I can only pray that some portion of the Investment loss that you have incurred over the past few months is the consequence of your poor decisions with regard to how to support your community - aka the people who make your paychecks possible. ￼
p.s. It’s never too late to correct yourself.
